fields.label: Title
fields.description: Titlen vises over introduktionsteksten.

fields.label: introduktionstekst
fields.description: Denne tekst vises før quizzen starter.

fields.label: Baggrundsbillede
fields.description: Et valgfrit baggrundsbillde til introduktionen.

semantics.label: Beståelsesprocent
semantics.description: Percentage of Total score required for passing the quiz.

fields.label: Progress text
fields.description: Text used if textual progress is selected.

fields.label: Label for jumping to a certain question
fields.description: You must use the placeholder '%d' instead of the question number, and %total instead of total amount of questions.

fields.label: Readspeaker progress
fields.description: May use @current and @total question variables

semantics.label: Disable backwards navigation
semantics.description: This option will only allow you to move forward in Question Set

semantics.label: Randomize questions
semantics.description: Enable to randomize the order of questions on display.

semantics.label: Number of questions to be shown:
semantics.description: Create a randomized batch of questions from the total.

fields.label: No results message
fields.description: Text displayed on end page when "Display results" is disabled

fields.label: Feedback heading
fields.description: This heading will be displayed at the end of the quiz when the user has answered all questions.

fields.label: Score announcer
fields.description: This label will be used for announcing the final score to the user on the end screen

fields.label: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

fields.label: Quiz passed greeting
fields.description: This text will be displayed above the score if the user has successfully passed the quiz.

fields.label: Passed comment
fields.description: This comment will be displayed after the score if the user has successfully passed the quiz.

fields.label: Quiz failed title
fields.description: This text will be displayed above the score if the user has failed the quiz.

fields.label: Failed comment
fields.description: This comment will be displayed after the score if the user has failed the quiz.

fields.label: Solution button label
fields.description: Text for the solution button.

fields.label: Retry button label
fields.description: Text for the retry button.

fields.label: Passed video
fields.description: This video will be played if the user successfully passed the quiz.

fields.label: Fail video
fields.description: This video will be played if the user fails the quiz.

fields.label: Show "Check" buttons
fields.description: This option determines if the "Check" button will be shown for all questions.

fields.label: Overskriv "Vi svar"-knap
fields.description: Dette valg afgør om "Vis svar"-knappen skal vises på alle spørgsmål, skjules for alle eller konfigureres individuelt til hvert spørgsmål.

fields.label: Overskriv "Prøv igen"-knap
fields.description: Dette valg afgør om "Prøv igen"-knappen skal vises på alle spørgsmål, skjules for alle eller konfigureres individuelt til hvert spørgsmål.
